about_the_game:
Wasp Sugar increases your chances of attracting Wasps by 10% and up to 4 Wasp Sugar's can be active in the Hive, the default Wasp attraction rate is 10% and with 3 sugars it can stack up to 40%

1 Wasp Sugar = 20% Chance of attracting Wasps
2 Wasp Sugar = 30% Chance of attracting Wasps
3 Wasp Sugar = 40% Chance of attracting Wasps

*Wasp Sugar requires a Hive to be active in order to provide beneficial features to your game
